    • Student

      public Student(String name, String lastName, String password, int age, Gender gender, int phoneNumber, int year, Degree degree, Faculty faculty, String speciality)
      Student's initializing block. Extends from User
      Parameters:
      name - - Student's first name
      lastName - - Student's last name
      password - - Student's password for login
      age - - Student's age
      gender - - Student's gender
      phoneNumber - - Student' phone number
      year - - Student's year
      degree - - Student's degree
      faculty - - Student's faculty
      speciality - - Student's specialty

      Also

      creates a new transcript

      creates a new schedule

      creates a new list of attendance

      creates a new list of marks
